wf_workflow_version.description: Workflow to check whether the CI is a Windows or Linux server and run the appropriate command to retrieve CPU usage information and apply to work notes of an Alert
wf_workflow_version.name: Get Top CPU Consumers
wf_workflow_version.on_cancel: // This script executes if the workflow is cancelled.// The global variable context_sys_id contains the sys_id of the cancelled workflow context.

wf_workflow.description: Workflow to check whether the CI is a Windows or Linux server and run the appropriate command to retrieve CPU usage information and apply to work notes of an Alert
wf_workflow.name: Get Top CPU Consumers

sys_variable_value.value: state=2^work_notes=Running workflow - Get Top CPU Consumers^short_description=Running workflow - Get Top CPU Consumers^EQ
state=2^work_notes=Running workflow - Get Top CPU Consumers^short_description=Running workflow - Get Top CPU Consumers^EQ
state=3^work_notes=Top CPU using processes retrieved successfully^EQ
state=3^work_notes=Top CPU using processes retrieved successfully^EQ
state=4^work_notes=Top CPU using processes failed to be retrieved^EQ
state=4^work_notes=Top CPU using processes failed to be retrieved^EQ
